recommended_degree: Hukum, Ilmu Hukum, Hukum Bisnis (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Legal Documentation & Licensing Support
Under the guidance of company legal team, manage and organize company legal documents, assist in maintaining corporate compliance files, and support all OSS RBA–related licensing activities. This includes reviewing permits, verifying KBLI classifications, preparing documentation for updates, and ensuring the company’s legal records remain accurate and up to date.
2. Contract Review & Management
Under the guidance of company legal team, assist in reviewing and summarizing client and vendor contracts. Maintain the contract database and lifecycle tracker, support the execution and archiving of agreements, and help ensure contract terms align with company policies and legal standards.
3. Legal Research & Compliance Monitoring
Under the direction of legal team, conduct legal and regulatory research relevant to the company’s business activities, prepare concise legal briefs, and support ongoing monitoring of laws and regulations in Indonesia. Assist the Legal Department in identifying compliance requirements and updating internal stakeholders on legal developments.
